mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule ( title, start_date, end_date, schedule_type, is_public, user_id, generation_id, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES (#{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{scheduleType}, #{isPublic}, #{userId}, #{generationId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET title = #{title}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, schedule_type = #{scheduleType}, is_public = #{isPublic}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{scheduleId}
